explanation: [SOCAR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR) is a fully state-owned national oil and gas company of Azerbaijan, involved in the exploration, production, transportation, processing, and sale of oil and natural gas. Its operations include significant oil extraction in the Caspian Sea and it runs several oil and gas pipelines. SOCAR's activities clearly categorize it within the fossil fuel industry as it operates refineries and filling stations across multiple countries, including Turkey and Georgia.
